analysisParams.promptTemplate: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.

promptUsed.system: You are an analyst who specializes in summarizing social media content. Provide a concise summary of the main topics, themes, and sentiments in these tweets.
promptUsed.user:
Please analyze these tweets from @Milojko Spajić and provide a summary of what they mainly talked about in the past week:

Država Crna Gora će uvijek i u svakoj situaciji stati uz svoje građane 🇲🇪❤️

Takođe, ne podržavamo miješanje naših zvaničnika u unutrašnju politiku drugih zemalja- prvo poslanik Knežević, a sada i Vuković- jer isti odnos očekujemo i prema Crnoj Gori. 
U vezi sa situacijom poslanika Vukovića naši nadležni organi su promptno reagovali prema kolegama iz Srbije i poslanik crnogorskog Parlamenta je već na putu ka Crnoj Gori.

Reforme otvaraju vrata za nove investicije i to EBRD prepoznaje! ✅ Nastavljamo sa velikim radom na privlačenju investicija koje donose ekonomski rast i otvaraju nova radna mjesta! 🚀🇲🇪❤️ https://t.co/letEb9VBTn

Sjutra ćemo se sresti sa predsjednikom opštine Ulcinj i  razgovarati o zabrinutostima Ulcinjana koji se tiču zakupa plaža. https://t.co/dSKTUJ9S6i

Ivica Kostelić je dobro i oporavlja se u barskoj bolnici. Izuzetno je zahvalan Vojsci 🇲🇪 za pravovremenu reakciju, kao i medicinskom kadru naše zemlje. Legendarni 🇭🇷 skijaš boravio je prethodnih dana na Prokletijama i rijeci Bojani - promovišući ljepote ovih naših dragulja, koji prema Kostelićevim riječima imaju ogroman potencijal i za ekstremne sportove. Ivice, ponovo nam dođi u goste! 🇲🇪🇭🇷🇪🇺❤️

summary:
The main topics discussed by @Milojko Spajić in the past week include:
1. Support for citizens of Montenegro and non-interference in other countries' internal politics.
2. Reforms to attract new investments and promote economic growth.
3. Meeting with the mayor of Ulcinj to address concerns about beach leases.
4. Health update on Ivica Kostelić and his promotion of Montenegro's natural beauty and potential for extreme sports. Sentiments expressed are positive and supportive of Montenegro and its initiatives.
keyTopics: Support for citizens of Montenegro and non-interference in other countries' internal politics
Reforms to attract new investments and promote economic growth
Meeting with the mayor of Ulcinj to address concerns about beach leases
Health update on Ivica Kostelić and his promotion of Montenegro's natural beauty and potential for extreme sports
